Actions.Name: Hungry Dead
Actions.Effects: All foes in range 2 are shoved 2 towards the grave, which could shove them inside of it.

Actions.Name: Vortex
Actions.Description: Characters in range 2 of the Grave are shoved 1 towards it, which could move them inside the Grave.

Actions.Name: Vomit Lightning
Actions.Description: A foe in range 4 takes [fray] damage and is electrified. Electrified characters must save or be winded.

Combo.Name: Cacophonous Consumption
Combo.Description: Characters inside the Grave must save or take [fray] damage five times, or twice on a failed save.
